assessment.question: How old is the patient?
What gender is the patient?
What is the patient's height?
What is the patient's weight?
What kind of surgery is the patient getting?
Has the patient had a previous surgery of the same kind?
Will the patient live with someone who can take care of them after the operation?
How far on average can the patient walk?
Which gait aid does the patient use?
What is the patient's DASS21 Depression Score?
What is the patient's DASS21 Anxiety Score?
What is the patient's DASS21 Stress Score?
What is the patient's smoking status?
Does this patient have rheumatoid, psoriatic, or osteoarthritis?
Does this patient have chronic back pain or a previous back injury?
Does this patient have diabetic or peripheral neuropathy?
Does this patient have a history of deep vein thrombosis, venous stasis, or other blood clotting disorders?
Has this patient had a myocardial infarction, coronary artery bypass, or a defibrillator implanted?
Does this patient have Osteoporosis?
Does this patient have a form of Hypothyroidism?
Does this patient have IBS?
Does this patient have obstructive sleep apnea?
